name: Date A Fidget Spinner
description:
He was a boy.

She was a fidget spinner.

He liked kid's toys.

She wanted a real man.

Could this love really work out?...

DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER !!!

"I know she's just a fidget spinner... But I'd definitely TAP THAT!"

A Visual Novel. About 2,500 words ~ Roughly 15 minutes playtime. Made in Ren'Py.
